tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayVARIABLE True isArrayX_GRIDS True isArrayX_GRIDS_CHECK False isArrayX_TABLE False isArrayPOINTS False isArrayZFIELD False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.climate_tools.1 VARIABLE $VARIABLE X_SOURCE $X_SOURCE X_GRIDS $X_GRIDS X_GRIDS_CHECK $X_GRIDS_CHECK X_TABLE $X_TABLE H_METHOD $H_METHOD V_METHOD $V_METHOD COEFFICIENTS $COEFFICIENTS LINEAR_SORTED $LINEAR_SORTED SPLINE_ALL $SPLINE_ALL TREND_ORDER $TREND_ORDER POINTS $POINTS ZFIELD $ZFIELD NAME '$NAME' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: VARIABLE
param.label: Variable
param.help: Variable The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: X_GRIDS
param.label: Level Heights
param.help: Level Heights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: X_GRIDS_CHECK
param.label: Minimum Height
param.help: if set, only values with level heights above DEM will be used The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: X_TABLE
param.label: Level Heights
param.help: Level Heights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: ZFIELD
param.label: Height
param.help: Height The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
